articles.title: Ronaldo fires as Juventus leave it late against 10-man Sassuolo - The World Game
articles.description: Juventus earned a 3-1 win over 10-man Sassuolo as goals from Danilo, Aaron Ramsey and Cristiano Ronaldo kept them in touch with Serie A leaders Milan.
articles.content:
Sassuolo had frustrated the Bianconeri in the first half but their combative approach saw Pedro Obiang sent off moments before half-time.

articles.content:
